text: @realDonaldTrump I heard your campaign has concerns that your false claims on the Covid-19 response aren't getting your message across to the nonMAGA public.  Instead, you will start promoting a connection between VP Biden & China.  Just curious; which China are you promoting?  Good or bad China?
